Detailed Description

This interface is used to encapsulate all calls to ODE in one single class. This has mainly been done so that it is not necessary to compile ODE in VisualC++ but to use the CIrrOdeNullDevice for the IrrEdit plugin
See also:
CIrrOdeNullDevice

CIrrOdeDevice

Constructor & Destructor Documentation
